Release History
===============

0.5.2 (2015-09-14)
------------------

* Metadata support at creation

0.5.1 (2015-09-01)
------------------

* CLI: container save action

0.5.0 (2015-08-28)
------------------

* CLI
* 3.0 oio proxy routes support
* Autocreate for containers
* Better testing automation

0.4 (2015-06-23)
------------------

* Simplified client
* Account support

0.3 (2015-04-20)
------------------

* Proxyd connection pooling with urllib3

0.2 (2015-04-09)
------------------

* Properties support

0.1 (2015-03-18)
------------------

* Lifting off!
